steady_state¶

class Multigroup¶

This is used for the steady state multigroup class.

INNER_TOLERANCE¶

The convergence tolerance for the inner loop.

OUTER_TOLERANCE¶

The convergence tolerance for the outer loop.

MAX_ITERATIONS¶

The number of iterations allowed in each loop.
